errors.error_description: Incorrect command syntax '--modules all' is used instead of the correct '-m all' flag
correction_candidates: aqt install-qt windows desktop 6.2.0 win64_mingw81 -m all
aqt install-qt windows desktop 6.2.0 win64_mingw81 --module all
aqt install-qt windows desktop 6.2.0 win64_mingw81 -modules all
aqt install-qt windows desktop 6.2.0 win64_mingw81 --install-modules all
errors.golden_answer: aqt install-qt windows desktop 6.2.0 win64_mingw81 -m all
